## Corporation interface

Corporation API

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface Corporation extends WarehouseAPI, OfficeAPI 
```
<b>Extends:</b> [WarehouseAPI](./bitburner.warehouseapi.md)<!-- -->, [OfficeAPI](./bitburner.officeapi.md)
